Applicant : Stubblefield , Shana
School (district) : Hillview Elementary School (Bonneville Joint School District 93)
Role(s) : School counselor;
LinkedIn Profile : I have taught English abroad in both China and Russia. I do PRN work as a crisis intake counselor at Idaho Falls Community Hospital, I also work in a Mens recovery home with addicts. I have been involved in several humanitarian projects within the community. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am a school counselor at a school where we have a large number of students below the poverty line. I want to be able to show my students that I can learn and do different things and so can they! I want to show my students the opportunities that are available to them!
